abstract: Plato, meanwhile, has filed motions seeking to block an acquisition of Renaissance by Permira.
snippet: Plato, meanwhile, has filed motions seeking to block an acquisition of Renaissance by Permira.
lead_paragraph: Renaissance Learning said on Monday that it had received a revised unsolicited cash offer from Plato Learning for $16.90 a share, or $496 million.

headline.main: Renaissance Gets Revised Offer From Plato
